cause.description:
Pakistan has become a place of political,moral and all other kinds of corruption. THey need to be free from this.. The Rich get Richer.. the poor get poorer. Pakistan is being taken advantage of by almost all countries out there. We need to free pakistan from corruption, from disease, from the influence of other corrupt countries... we need to help the poor in pakistan...we need to do so many things to support it.. Join this Cause if u feel this way very strongly or even a little bit..
1. Free pakistan
cause.name: FREE PAKISTAN
